# Planning Your Visit

## Hours

**TUESDAY—SUNDAY**

**11 AM — 4 PM**

**CLOSED MONDAY**

DMC closes when NMC Closes due to inclement weather.

**The museum will be open for the holidays on December 22, 23, 27 - 30, 2025, and will be open until 6:00 PM on Tuesdays through December 23.**

### **DMC CLOSURES**

**WINTER BREAK** \- December 24 - 26, 31, and January 1, 2026. 

**EASTER** \- Sunday, April 5, 2026

**NMC COMMENCEMENT** \- Saturday, May 2, 2026

**BAYSHORE MARATHON** \- Saturday, May 23, 2026

### DMC COMMUNITY FREE DAYS

**MARTIN LUTHER KING JR. DAY** \- Monday, January 19, 2026

**EARTH DAY CLOTHING SWAP** \- Wednesday, April 22, 2026

**SPRING ART MARKET** \- Saturday May 9, 2026

## Admission

|   
---|---  
Adults | $10.00  
Children 17 & Under | $5.00  
Children 4 & Under | FREE  
Members | FREE  
NMC Staff & Students | FREE  
ROAM & NARM & ASTC Members | FREE  
Museums For All* | FREE  
Military Families & Veterans | FREE  
  
*EBT (Bridge) and WIC card holders, and regional foster families receive up to four free admissions as part of the Museums for All program.

Museum admission prices are subject to change with special exhibitions. Please contact the museum at (231) 995-1055 for more information.

admission_text:
* [Support](../index.html) >
  * Membership 

# Support Today. Sustain Tomorrow.

Membership is at the very heart of the Dennos Museum Center. Your critical membership dollars directly fund programming, operations, collections care, and--most importantly--enables us to serve over 60,000 visitors each and every year. Many of our visitors receive free or reduced admission through [K-12 scholarships](../../education/resources/index.html), the [NEA Blue Star Museums](https://www.arts.gov/national-initiatives/blue-star-museums "\(link opens new window\)") program for veterans, and [IMLS Museums for All](https://museums4all.org/ "\(link opens new window\)").

## Benefits

All Dennos Museum Center membership levels include:

  * Free admission to the Dennos Museum Center (excludes ticketed events/exhibits)
  * 10% discounts at the Museum Store
  * Discounts on DMC concerts and event tickets
  * Digital Membership Cards

Members at the**$100 Trailblazer level or above** receive the added benefit of reciprocal membership to [NARM](https://narmassociation.org/members/) and [ROAM](https://sites.google.com/site/roammuseums/home) and now [ASTC](https://www.astc.org/membership/find-an-astc-member/passport/).

This benefit provides FREE admission to over 2,000 museums nationwide, while every dollar you contribute stays at the Dennos and strengthens your local museum.

### digital membership cards

In partnership with [Cuseum](https://cuseum.com/), we launched digital membership cards in Mar...
accessibility_text:
* [Events](../index.html) >
  * Dennos Concert Series

# Dennos Concert Series

# Music That Will Move You

Welcome to the Dennos Museum Center and Milliken Auditorium! Your support of the arts in our community - through your ticket purchases, your attendance, and sharing your experience with others - remains as important as ever as we work to bring you thoughtfully curated music concerts for all.

## What To Expect

On the night of the concert,**doors will open one hour before showtime**. During that time, the **galleries will be open for ticket buyers to view our current exhibitions, and shop the museum store** for waters and light snacks. View our [current exhibitions](../../art/now-on-view/index.html) and [upcoming exhibitions](../../art/upcoming-exhibitions/index.html) to learn more about what will be on view before each performance you attend. Shows are typically 75-90 minutes and do not include an intermission.  

Current NMC Students can get two FREE tickets to any show. Email [dmc@nmc.edu](mailto:dmc@nmc.edu) to secure free student tickets in advance.

### [**Joan Shelley**](https://www.simpletix.com/e/joan-shelley-tickets-247176)

**Friday, January 16 | 7:00 PM  
****$15 - $25  
**

GET TICKETS
